 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּאֵנָה‎</span> **noun feminine** ==fig-tree==, (then) fig (√ dubious; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎תֵּינְתָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; perhaps Punic <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תין‎</span> (see [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>385</sup>; i.e. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּיֵן‎</span> [[BDB#Eut|Eut]], see [[BDB#DHM|DHM]]<sup>VOJ i. 26</sup>), Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***tittu, a tree;***</u></abbr> [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>M i. 58 ff.</sup> combines <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ת‎</span> (precariously) with √ (III) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אנה‎</span> ***meet opportunely***, with reference to fructifying of fig by another tree, compare [[BDB#Hom|Hom]]<sup>Aufsätze u.Abh. i. (1892), 100</sup>); — absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ת‎</span> [[Judg.9.10|Judg 9:10]] +; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּאֵנָתוֺ‎</span> [[1Kgs.5.5|1Kgs 5:5]] +, etc.; plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּאֵנִים‎</span> [[Num.13.23|Num 13:23]] +; construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּאֵנֵי‎</span> [[Jer.24.2|Jer 24:2]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּאֵנֵיכֶם‎</span> [[Amos.4.9|Amos 4:9]] — 

**1.** ***fig-tree*** (***ficus carica*** [[BDB#Post|Post]]<sup>Flora. 730; Hast. DB, under the word</sup> [[BDB#Tristr|Tr]]<sup>NHB.350</sup> M'Lean-Th-Dyer<sup>Ency. Bib., under the word</sup>; compare [[BDB#Löw|Löw]]<sup>§ 335</sup>; often + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גֶּפֶן‎</span>): [[Judg.9.10|Judg 9:10]]; [[Judg.9.11|Judg 9:11]] (in allegory), [[Amos.4.9|Amos 4:9]]; [[Hos.9.10|Hos 9:10]]; [[Nah.3.12|Nah 3:12]]; [[1Kgs.5.5|1Kgs 5:5]]; [[2Kgs.18.31|2Kgs 18:31]] = [[Isa.36.16|Isa 36:16]]; [[Mic.4.4|Mic 4:4]]; [[Isa.34.4|Isa 34:4]]; [[Prov.27.18|Prov 27:18]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲלֵה ת‎</span> [[Gen.3.7|Gen 3:7]] ([[BDB#J|J]]) ***fig-leaves***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָֽנְטָה פַגֶּיהָ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַתּ‎</span> [[Song.2.13|Song 2:13]] collective [[Num.20.5|Num 20:5]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]), [[Hos.2.14|Hos 2:14]]; [[Jer.5.17|Jer 5:17]]; [[Jer.8.13|Jer 8:13]]; [[Deut.8.8|Deut 8:8]]; [[Hab.3.17|Hab 3:17]]; [[Hag.2.19|Hag 2:19]]; [[Zech.3.10|Zech 3:10]]; [[Joel.1.7|Joel 1:7]]; [[Joel.1.12|Joel 1:12]]; [[Joel.2.22|Joel 2:22]]; [[Ps.105.33|Ps 105:33]]. 

**2.** ***fig***, always plural: [[Num.13.23|Num 13:23]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]), [[Jer.24.1|Jer 24:1]]; [[Jer.24.2|Jer 24:2]] (twice in verse); [[Jer.24.3|Jer 24:3]] (twice in verse); [[Jer.24.5|Jer 24:5]]; [[Jer.24.8|Jer 24:8]]; [[Jer.29.17|Jer 29:17]] (all symbolic of Judaeans), [[Jer.8.13|Jer 8:13]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּתְּאֵנָה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵין תּ‎</span>), [[Neh.8.13|Neh 8:13]] as medicament, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דְּבֶלֶת ת‎</span> [[2Kgs.20.7|2Kgs 20:7]] = [[Isa.38.21|Isa 38:21]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּאֵנֵי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַבַּכֻּרוֺת‎</span> [[Jer.24.2|Jer 24:2]] ***the figs of early ripeness*** (compare [[BDB#Du|Du]]). 

<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּאֲנִיָּה‎</span> see [I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אנה‎</span>]. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּאֻנִים‎</span> see I.  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎און‎</span>.
